data.title: Net Worth – World Blaze
data.text:
Gauri Pradhan Tejwani is primarily a model and later became popular in television as an actress. She became popular for few characters in television serials. She also did some music videos. She participated in few reality shows. She hosted few shows too.

Net Worth

Gauri Pradhan’s net worth is currently unknown. However, her net worth is estimated to grow hugely in 2019.This data is collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

The main income source of Gauri Pradhan Tejwani is from television. She got popular with various roles in serials. She also participates in reality shows. Being a model, she also can be found in commercials. She is also doing some music videos. These are the sources of income for Gauri Pradhan.

Real Name: Gauri Pradhan Tejwani

Date of Birth: 16 September,1977

Nick Name: Gauri

Age:41 years

Height: 173 cm

Weight: 60kg

Personal Background

Gauri Pradhan Tejwani was born in Jammu and Kashmir. Her father is a retired Indian Army Officer namely, Major Subhash Vasudeo Pradhan. Her mother is Asha. Gauri Pradhan has 2 siblings. Her elder brother is Bharat who is a petrochemical engineer. Her younger sister is Geetanjali who is a M.D.She studied in different schools in India. She did her bachelor’s in Electronics from Sir Parashurambhau Collegein Pune. Later, she enrolled in an institute affiliated to London University for a course in psychology.

Marital Status: Married

Career

Gauri Pradhan started modelling at an early age. While she was still studying she participated in Femina Miss India contest and has earned great stardom on television. Due to her modelling background, she acted in many commercials for well-known brands like Bru, Sprite, Ponds, Santoor, Breeze, Colgate, Philips, etc., She made her acting debut in 1999 in Doordarshan with historical tele-series Noor Jahan. She became famous with the role Gauri Agarwal Mittal in Kutumb serial. Later, she did many roles in different television serials out of which Kyun ki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, Tu Aashiqui and meri aashiqui tumse hi are famous. She also did 3 music videos. She participated in different reality shows.

Personal Life:

Gauri Pradhan was born on 16 September, 1977. She met Hiten Tejwani while shooting for breeze soap commercial. They were coincidentally cast as lead pair in Kutumb serial. Later, they fell in love for 2 years and then got married on 29 April 2004. They are parents of twins, a boy and a girl.

More Information

Gauri Pradhan received many awards for Kyun ki Saas Bhi Kabhi in 2005, 2007 and 2008 for the same serial.

Gauri Khan is popular as an interior designer and Indian film producer. As a designer, she has her own interior design studio. She is wife of one of the Bollywood’s biggest stars, Shah Rukh Khan. She, with her husband co-founded the production company, Red Chillies Entertainment and its subsidiaries. She is one of the 50 most powerful women in Business in India.

Net Worth

As a producer and designer, Gauri Khan spends a lavish life owning luxurious car and villa. Her net worth is expected to be around Rs. 1600 Crore. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

The main income source of Gauri Khan is mainly from the production house. The approximate annual turnover is Rs. 500 crore. She also earns from her own interior design studio designing for various celebrities.

Real Name: Gauri Chibber

Date of Birth: 8 October,1970

Nick Name: The First Lady of Bollywood

Age: 48 years

Height: 161 cm

Weight: 57kg

Personal Background

Gauri Khan was born in Delhi, India. Her father is Colonel Ramesh Chandra Chibber. Her mother is Savita. She has a brother namely, Vikrant Chibber. She belongs to Punjabi Hindu Brahmin Family. They are from Rawalpindi, however, they are raised in the suburb of Panchsheel Park. She completed her schooling from Loreto Convent School. She graduated with B.A.(Hons.) from Lady Shri Ram College. She also attended National Institute Of Fashion Technology and did a 6 month course on fashion design.

Marital Status: Married

Career

Gauri Khan along with her husband, Shah Rukh Khan co-founded production company, Red Chillies Entertainment in 2002. The first movie that was directed under this production company was Main Hoon Na which was a box office hit. Other hits from the same production house are Om Shanti Om, My Name is Khan and Chennai Express. Other hits are Happy new Year, Dilwale and Raees. She designed spaces for some top celebrities like Mukesh Ambani, Ralph Lauren and Roberto Cavalli as an interior designer. She also designed for Karan Johar, Sidharth Malhotra and Jacqueline Fernandez. She was named as “50 Most Powerful Women in Business in India”

Personal Life

Gauri Khan was born on 8 October, 1970 in Delhi. She met Shah Rukh Khan in 1984. They got married on 25 October 1991. They both have a daughter and 2 sons.

More Information

Gauri Khan met Shah Rukh when she was 14 years old. She is a big fan of Justin Beiber. She opened her own interior designing store in Mumbai.

Anup Soni is famous television actor and anchor. He is popular with his T.V series Balika Vadhu and Crime Patrol. He hosted various programs in T.V. He played small roles in films like Gangaajal, Khushi, Apaharan and Footpath. He married Juhi Babbar and is son-in-law to Bollywood actor and politician, Raj Babbar.

Net Worth

As an actor who does most of his work in Hindi Industry, he owns a house in Mumbai and Cars which include Mercedes Benz and Toyota Fortuner. His net worth is approxiamately 35 crores. However, these figures are taken from various sources and we cannot confirm the same.

Income Source

The main income source is through acting and hosting various shows in television. His monthly income will be lakhs.

Real Name: Anup Soni

Date of Birth: 30 January 1975

Nick Name: Anup Soni

Age: 44 years

Height:174 cm

Weight: 82 kg

Personal Background

Anup Soni was born in Ludhiana, Punjab. His father is Ramesh Chandra Soni. He belongs to Hindu Family.

Marital Status: Married

Career

From Childhood he dreamt of becoming an actor and so the got enrolled in National School of Drama. After graduating from NSD, he was offered various roles. He made his debut in television series Saaya and Sea Hawks. Along with TV series, he started acting in films even though they are less significant roles and his first film is Fiza which released on 2000. He acted in National award-winning film Gangajaal. Most of the films he acted didn’t click at box office and so he majorly succeeded in small screen. He was appreciated for his roles in Balika Vadhu and Crime Patrol. His performance in Crime Patrol made him very popular across India. It is one of the highest rated show. He maintains very professional relation with co-actors and his producer Ekta Kapoor.

Currently he has undergone a major transformation with physique and is looking for challenging roles.

Personal Life

Anup Soni was born on 30 January 1975. He divorced his first wife Ritu in 2010 with whom he had two kids, Zoya and Myra Soni. He later married Juhi Babbar on 14 March 2011. He had a son Imaan. Currently they are staying in Mumbai. He is brother-in-law of actors Prateik and Arya Babbar.

More Information

He worked as a faculty in Kishore Namit Kapoor Acting school and used to take voice and speech classes.

In the last 10 years, he didn’t appear in any films and his last film was Striker.

Kiku Sharda is famously known as Palak in Kapil Sharma comedy show. He is a comedian who makes the entire country laugh with his funny gigs.

Net Worth: 10 (Estimated) Million Dollars. However, these are taken from various sources and we cannot confirm the same.

Real Name: Raghavendra Kiku Sharda

Date of Birth: 14 February 1975

Age: 43

Height: 162 Centimeters

Personal Life

Kiku was born to Marwari business family Amarnath and Janaki. His father was a business man from Rajasthan. He did his schooling from Don Bosco High School, Mumbai and pursued his college in Commerce from Monje College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai. Later he also completed MBA from Chetan’s Institute of Management Studies and Research, Mumbai. He is married to Priyanka Sharda and have two sons together namely Aryan and Shaurya.

Career

Kiku started his career with a Punjabi movie ‘Mitti’ where he played as Qasma in 2001. He then acted in different movies such as Darna Mana Hai, Dhamaal and No Smoking. His television debut was with Hatim serial where his role play was Hobo in Star Plus channel.Also, he played in serials like Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa, Akbar Birbal and Agadam Bagdam. He along with his wife participated in Nach Baliye 6 and in Jhalak Dikhla ja Jaa 7.He surprised with his dance moves given his weight. As on date he is working in Kapil Sharma’s famous comedy show on Sony entertainment TV. Before this he worked in Comedy Circus Ke Ajoobe and Comedy nights with Kapil show. He won awards and nomination including Indian Telly Awards for Best Actor Supporting Role in Comedy category. He also made his presence in No problem and Happy New Year movie.Also his role in F.I.R as Mulayam Singh is very famous. He also played a role in Hera Pheri which became a big hit in comedy genre.

More Information

Kiku Sharda was arrested on stage with Kapil Sharma show for mimicking Dera Sacha Sauda Chief Gurmeet Ram Raheem Singh on his show.He was put in judicial custody for 14 days. Kiku apologized in public and addressed the issue by implying that he was doing it in a comedy way and as written in the script. He also implied the channel is responsible for not editing the content. Kiku owns a BMWX1 and Audi 8 which are one of his good collections. Palak is a lady like role that Kiku has taken up on the comedy show with Kapil Sharma. Let us hope that Kiku brings his best through the television comedy.

Ali Asgar is a known face in comedy world. He has worked in many television series and movies. Currently he is known as Dadi an exceptional role he plays in Kapil Sharma’s show at colors.

Net Worth: 8 Million Dollars. However, these are taken from various sources and we cannot confirm the same.

Real Name: Ali Asgar

Date of Birth:7 December 1966

Age: 52

Marital Status: Married

Height: 5’ 4’’

Personal Life

Ali Asgar was born in Mumbai, Maharashtra. He went to St Joseph High School, Mumbai. He is married to Siddika Asgar and have two children namely Nuyaan Asgar and Ada Asgar. He pursued Bachelor of Arts in Political Science and did a course in Hotel Management and catering.

Career

He started as a child artist and his first serial was Ek Do Teen Char in 1980s over Doordharshan. He played one of those 4 kids who portray as detectives and worked against social evils. He is known for his height 5’ 3’’ in comedy shows and turned out popular including Dil Vil Pyar Vyar.The story revolves around two colleges where one is completely boys and the other college is completely girls. Ali Asgar is famous for his acting in this serial and the comedy made this soap a huge success.His other popular character was from Kahani Ghar Ghar ki as Kamal Aggarwal. He also played as inspector Raj Aryan in F.I.R which was aired in SAB TV. He also appeared in the TV serial Jeanie and Juju. He plays the lead role in Jeanie and Juju which was inspired from the American tv soap serial called ‘I dream of Jeanie’. Ali asgar plays the role of a pilot who discovers a 2000 year old Jeanie and the story revolves around funny adventures. His film career also has been very prominent. He acted in Tees Maar Khan, Sunday, Agneepath, Do Knot Disturb, Partner and Shortcut etc.

He also did anchoring for the show Shaadi 30 Million ki. He was awarded for the best supporting role as Dadi for Kapil Sharma’s show.

More Information

His Debut movie was in Jaanam Tere Naam (1992). His favorite food is Kebabs and Parathas. He follows Islam as his religion. His favorite movie is Mughal-e-Azham and The Godfather. Ali Asgar entertains the audience to his full capacity and has been in industry for a very long period. We hope he makes people laugh like he does with his sense of humor and his noticeable height.

Chandan Prabhakar is best known as the Indian Stand-up comedian. He is actively working comedy show with Kapil Sharma in ‘Comedy nights with Kapil Sharma’. His sense of humor on stage fills the air with laughter.

Net Worth: 1.9 Million (Estimated) dollars. However, this number is taken from various website and we cannot confirm the validity of the same

Real Name: Chandan Prabhakar

Date of Birth: Year 1981

Age: 36 Year

Height: 5’ 9’’

Marital Status:Married

Personal Life

Chandan Prabhakar was born in Amritsar in 1981. He went to the Shri Ram Ashram Senior Secondary school, Amritsar. He then attended Hindu college to complete his graduation in Mechanical Engineering. He married Nandini Khanna in 2015 and they have a daughter who is born in 2017. He is a childhood friend of Kapil Sharma.

Career

Chandan was a first runner up in ‘The Great Indian Laughter challenge’ show. He became more popular once he joined Kapil Sharma’s show and gained lots of accolades as Raju who is a Chai wala. He has done more than 100 episodes in Kapil Sharma’s show. Chandan also acted in many Punjabi movies such as Power Cut released in 2011. He played as lineman in the movie. Another movie of him starring as detective Pradyuman in Disco Singh. He plays a witty role and is a dear friend of the hero in the movie where they work together on a murder mystery. His third movie was Judge Singh LLB where he played the role of Advocate Vijay Soni. His debut in Bollywood was with the movie Bhavnao Ko Samjho which was released in 2010.

He acted along with famous comedians like Johny Liver and Gurpreet Ghugi. Currently he is working on the new show ‘The comedy family’ with some of the crew members from Kapil Sharma’s show such as Sunil Grover and Ali Asgar.

More Information

Chandan’s hobbies include painting and travelling. He used to exhibit his paintings in different foreign countries but had to give up due to the schedule in Kapil Sharma’s show. He was also a producer to the show Laughter Da Master in Punjabi which aired on ETC channel. He owns a BMW car.His friendship with Kapil is irreplaceable and they continue to entertain audience no matter how many hurdles they have to face together. Chandan is an educated individual with great sense of humor to entertain the audience with right sense of comedy. I hope he gets many roles in upcoming movies and comedy TV shows.

Upasana Singh is famous Indian actress and stand-up comedian. She is well known face with her bright eyes in many movies. She is also well known for her funny English dialogue delivery.

Real Name: Upasana Singh

Date of Birth: June 29th, 1975

Age: 43

Height: 5’ 6’’

Marital Status: Married

Personal Life

She was born in Kapurthala, Punjab India. She is married to Neeraj Bharadwaj who plays the role of Chirag Modi in Star Plus serial ‘Saath Nibhana Saathiya’. She also worked with her husband in TV-serial Aye-Dil-e-Nadaan. After working together they decided to get married.She prefers vegetarian food only.

Career

She appeared in Babul a 1986 movie. Her first breakthrough was in 1988 in a Rajasthani movie called ‘Bai Chali Sasariye’.She is popular for her onscreen style and Punjabi accent of English dialogues.With her first salary of RS 10,000 rupees she gifted a jewelry set to her mother. She also appeared in Jai Hanuman serial, 1997. In 1997, she was recognized for her stupendous acting as deaf mute in movie Judaai. She recently became famous for playing Pinky Bua in Comedy nights with Kapil show. She also worked in many Punjabi and Bhojpuri movies. She worked with Kapil in Comedy nights until 2016 when the show shifted to Sony TV from Colors TV. She stopped working for Kapil and went to Krishna Abhishek’s show. Few months later she was back with Kapil and is unsatisfied with the script. Her trade mark dialogue ‘Bittu, Kaunhainyehaadme’ is very famous. She also played many character roles in movies such as Loafer, Mein Prem Ki Diwani hoon, Golmaal returns, Old is Gold, Aitraaz, Mujhse Shaadi Karoge and Hungama. Her major television series include Pari Hoon Mein, Yeh Meri Life Hain, Sonpari and Raja Ki Ayegi Bharat. She is currently playing the role of Panchami in SAV TV’s Jija ji Chhat Par Hain. She also appeared in Lady Inspector show and Patake Tha a Punjabi serial. In 2017, she also worked in Judwaa 2 with Varun Dhawan and Taapsee Pannu. Also her continuous part in a Punjabi sequel ‘Carry On Jatta’ got her accolades.

More Information

Her favorite food is Rajma Chawal. Her favorite actor is Amitabh Bachan and favorite actress Madhuri Dixit and Hema Malini. Due to her style and funny way of delivering dialogue she is a unique comedian of her lifetime. I hope she brings laughter to the audience with her upcoming performances.

Karishma Tanna is an anchor, model and actress. She appeared in many television programs and in Bollywood movies. She also participated in number of reality shows and also appeared as guest and host in few reality shows. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Karishma Tanna’s estimated net worth is about Rs. 2 crore. She charges around Rs. 80k per episode. She is spending a comfortable life and owns a lavish car. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

Karishma Tanna earns mainly from television. She acts in different television serials. She also participates in reality shows and appears as guest and host for few shows. Apart from these, she does modelling, dancing and has done few in television too. She also acted in Bollywood movies and they are some big movies.

Real Name: Karishma Tanna

Date of Birth: 21 December,1983

Nick Name: Karu

Age: 35 years

Height: 175 cm

Weight: 60 kg

Personal Background

Karishma Tanna was born in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Her father was expired in 2012, she is very close to her mother and even have a tattoo of her. Her mother is Jasmine Tanna and sister is Drishma Kadam. She did her graduation from Sydenham College Of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai. She likes to read, travel, watch movies and spend time in Gym.

Marital Status: Unmarried

Career

Karishma Tanna made her debut as “Indira Virani” in “Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi” in 2001. She became famous for this role and 2 other roles from “Nagarjuna – Ek Yodha” and “Qayamat Ki Raat”. She appeared in many reality shows like Bigg Boss, Zara Nachke Dikha, Nach Baliye, and Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa. She was the first runner up in the bigg boss show. She made her debut in film industry with “Dosti – Friends forever”. She was a lead actress in a Kannada Movie, “I am sorry Mathe Banni Preethsona”. She appeared as Madhuri Dixit in the movie “Sanju”. She appeared in other movies like Grand Masti and Tina and Lolo.

Personal Life

Karishma Tanna was born on 21 December, 1983. She belongs to Gujarati Family. She had quite a number of relationships with Bappa Lahiri, Hanif Hilal, Rushabh Choksi, Upen Patel. She met Upen Patel in Bigg Boss and they also got engaged in 2014 but later, broke up in 2016.

More Information

Karishma Tanna won 3 awards for “Stylish Female in reality show”, “Most Fit Actor” categories. She was one of the most controversial contestants of Bigg Boss 8.

Sugandha Mishra is an all-rounder. She is an actress, Singer, television presenter and a comedy actress. She participated in many singing and comedy shows. She also acted and hosted in television shows. She was also a radio jockey. She gave voice to songs in Bollywood movies and also sang songs in television. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Sugandha Mishra’s net worth is unknown and the exact value is fluctuating. However, she takes 2-3 lakhs (Estimated) per episode for a comedy show. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

Sugandha Mishra has a good amount of sources for her income. The main income source is from television with her singing and comedy talent. She also gives voice for songs. She performed at some events too. She was initially a radio jockey. These are all the sources of income for Sugandha Mishra.

Real Name: Sugandha Mishra

Date of Birth: 23 May,1985

Nick Name: Nightingale

Age: 33 years

Height: 165 cm

Weight: 48 kg

Personal Background

Sugandha Mishra was born in Jalandhar, Punjab. Her father is Santosh Mishra. Her mother is Savita Mishra. She is the 4th generation from her family to be into singing and belongs to Indore gharana. She attended Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar to complete her masters and is pursuing her doctorate from Apeejay College of Fine arts, Jalandhar.

Marital Status: Unmarried

Career

Sugandha Mishra started as a radio jockey in Big FM, for a morning show. She made her debut into television with “The Great Indian Laughter Challenge” and became very famous as a comedian. She was a finalist in that show. She also was a 3rd runner up in the reality show, Zee Hero Honda-Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Singing superstar. She sang many songs, jingles, bhajans, playback in plays, short films, etc., She portrayed the popular teacher’s character, “Vidyavati” in The Kapil Sharma’s Show. She also does mimicry and gives voice to Bollywood songs namely in the movies, “Shree” and “Kamaal Dhamaal and Malamaal”. She also made her debut into film industry with “Heropanti” in 2014.

Personal Life

Sugandha Mishra was born on 23 May, 1985. She is the granddaughter of the legend, Pt. Shankar Lal Mishra, Disciple of Ustaad Amir Khan Sahib. He trained her from childhood.

More Information

Sugandha Mishra performed at the age of 3 in front of Kaifi Azmi who is a poet and father of Shabana Azmi. Kapil Sharma was her senior when she was doing her masters.

Mahhi Vij was well known as an actress and model. She acted in various television serials and was popular for 2 particular serials. She also participated in dance reality show and has won the show. She also acted as female lead role. She appeared in various music videos. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Being an actress and dancer Mahhi Vij’s estimated net worth is around $2 million. She charges INR 45k to 50k per episode. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

The main income of source for Mahhi Vij is from television. She acted in various television serials. She also participated in many reality shows and won a dance show. As she is a model, actress and dancer, she earns pretty well.

Real Name: Mahhi Vij

Date of Birth: 1 April,1982

Nick Name: Mahi

Age:36 years

Height: 155 cm

Weight: 48kg

Personal Background

Mahhi Vij was born in Delhi. She did her schooling from Lilawati Vidya Mandir Senior Secondary School, Delhi. She did her graduation from University of Delhi, New Delhi. She belongs to South Asian ethnicity. Her parents are Punjabi.

Marital Status: Married

Career

Mahhi Vij made her debut into television in 2007 with Akela. She played the role of pratha in Kaisi Laagi Lagan & Shubh Kadam. Later, she played the role of Nakusha Patil in Laagi Tujhse Lagan for which she became popular in 2009. She participated in many reality shows like Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Season 4, Comedy circus, Comedy nights with Kapil, Bigg Boss Season 9 and Fear Factor. She participated in dance reality show, Nach Baliye Season 5 along with Jay Bhanushali. She became quite popular with her dance in the show and won the season. In Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi, she was injured badly in the leg for which she opted out of the show.

She made her debut in Malayalam film industry with Aparichithan as Kalyani. She also became popular for her role as Nandini Shivraj Shekhar in Balika Vadhu. She is a model and appeared in many music videos like Tu, Tu Hai Wahi.

Personal Life

Mahhi Vij was born on 1 April, 1982. She got married to her long-time boyfriend, Jay Bhanushali. She also performed along with him in Nach Bhaliye and won the season.

More Information

Mahhi Vij believes in numerology and according to the numerologist advice, she changed her name from Mahi to Mahhi.

Gautami Kapoor is famous for acting in television and movies. She also did her modelling. She became popular with playing lead roles in few shows. She also did Marathi movies. She appeared in Zee TV, Star Plus and sony TV which are all famous television channels. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Gautami Kapoor’s net worth is estimated to be $5 million which includes her husband’s net worth too. They have a luxurious car and are earning well. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

Gautami Kapoor’s main income of source comes from television. She acted in a couple of shows. She also did her modelling. She appeared as an actress in movies too. These are the main income of source for her.

Real Name: Gautami Gadgil Kapoor

Date of Birth: 21 June,1974

Nick Name: Not Known

Age: 44 years

Height: 170 cm

Weight: 58kg

Personal Background

Gautami Kapoor was born in Maharashtra. She got her degree from Ruia College, Mumbai. Her initial name was Gautami Gadgil but later changed it to Gautami Kapoor after her marriage. She is a Hindu.

Marital Status: Married

Career

Gautami Kapoor made her debut in 1999 with Saturday Suspense in television. She also made her movie debut in the same year, with Bindhast which was directed by Chandrakant Kulkarni. In 2000, she acted as a lead role in Ghar Ek Mandir. She became popular with this role. She acted alongside Ram Kapoor and the couple were liked by audience. She is also famous for the role, Simran Gupta in Parvarrish – Season 2. She did other tv drama serial like Lipstick, Dhadkan, Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, Tere Sheher Mein, Khelti Hai Zindagi Aankh Micholi, Kehta Hai Dil. With this fame she also did acting in movies like, Kuch Na Kaho, Fanaa, Student of the year, Shaadi Ke Side Effects, Lekar Hum Deewana Dil. She also acted in Marathi films.

Personal Life

Gautami Kapoor was born on 21 June, 1974. She first got married to Madhur Shroff who is a commercial photographer but got divorced due to some family problems. Later, she found her life partner on the set of Ghar ek Mandir namely Ram Kapoor. They dated for 2 years and got married on 14th February, 2003. They have a son, Aks and daughter, Sia together.

More Information

Gautami Kapoor got nominated in the category, Best Actress in Lead role for the Indian Telly awards for the serial, Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi BahuThi.

Pankhuri Awasthy is an actress who works primarily in Indian Television. Before acting she worked as an assistant manager in ITC hotels. She is famous for her roles as Razia Sultana in Razia Sultan Serial and Draupadi in “Suryaputra Karn”.

She married her long-time boyfriend Gautam Rode. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Pankhuri Awasthy’s net worth is unknown and the exact value is fluctuating. Her net worth is close to 1 (Estimated) crore. She owns a car. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

Pankhuri Awasthy’s main source of income is through television. Along with that she works in TV commercials. She is taking 35k per day currently for working in “Kya Kasoor Hai Amla ka?”.

Real Name: Pankhuri Awasthy

Date of Birth: 31 March,1991

Nick Name: Pankhuri

Age: 27 years

Height: 165 cm

Weight: 53kg

Personal Background

Pankhuri Awasthy was born in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Her father is Sanjay Awasthi. Her mother is Arthi Awasthi. She has two brothers Abhishek Awasthi and Rajat Awasthi. Her family moved to Delhi when she was child andshe attended Bluebells Internatioal school in Delhi. She did her bachelor’s in arts in Hindu College, Delhi. She was very active from her school and participates regularly in cultural activities. In college, she was part of drama society.

Marital Status: Married.

Career

She started her career as an assistant manager in ITC Hotels, Bangalore after her degree. Since she was interested in acting, she quit the job and moved to Mumbai. She began her acting career in “Yeh Hai Aashiqui” and also acted in MTV Fanaah. She got her break through role Razia Sultana as lead and was appreciated for her performance. She also played as Draupadi in “Suryaputra Karan” which brought her fame. She is currently acting in TV Show “Kya Qusoor Hai Amala Kya?”

Personal Life

Pankhuri Awasthy married her long-time boyfriend Gautam Rode on 5th Feb 2018. Both got married in Alwar attended by their close friends and relatives. He is also a famous T.V actor and 14 years older than her.

More Information

Pankhuri Awasthy’s favourite movie is Swades and her favourite actor is Shah Rukh Khan.

She is very particular about her fitness and maintains a slim body.

She is very fond of writing and her favourite food is Pasta and Sandwich.

She worked in T.V commercials Art India Jewellery and Croma Coffee Maker.

Nigaar Khan is an actress who works primarily in Indian Films and television. She is sister of popular TV actress Gauhar Khan. She started her career with modelling and later moved to acting. She participated in various reality shows. In this article, let us know more about her.

Net Worth

Nigaar Khan’s net worth is unknown,and the exact value is fluctuating. Her net worth is close to 12 (Estimated) crores. These values are collected from various websites and is not confirmed.

Income Source

Nigaar Khan’s main source of income is through television and films. She earns through modelling and reality shows as well.

Real Name: Nigaar Khan

Date of Birth: 2 May,1979

Nick Name: Nigaar

Age: 40 years

Height: 170 cm

Weight: 53kg

Personal Background

Nigaar Khan was born in Pune, Maharashtra. Her mother is Razia Zafar. She has three siblings and she is third child and Gauhar Khan is the younger sister. She did her schooling and college in Pune and moved to Mumbai to pursue her acting dreams.

Marital Status: Married.

Career

She started her career as model and participated in Femina Elite Modelling where she became the third finalist. After modelling, she acted in various TV commercials.While doing modelling he acted in a small role in Zee Tv show Lipstick. She acted in serial Pratima in 2003. Between 2003 to 2006, she acted in India Calling which gave a break through after which she acted in multiple TV shows. She became popular for her antagonist roles.In 2012, she appeared in the reality show Sacch Ka Saamna. In 2014, she entered Bigg Boss 8 Hindi show as wild card entry and came out of the house in one week. She acted and mythological show Buddha and played various charactersin Comedy Nights with Kapil.

Personal Life

More Information

Nigaar Khan’s favourite actors are Salman Khan and Aamir Khan.

She is very fond of Dancing and Shopping and her favourite destination includes New York.

She is currently settled in Dubai.

She appeared in the song “Woh Ladki Hai Kaha” in Dil Chahta Hai movie.

Krystle D’Souza was born in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Her father is Merwyn D’Souza and mother is Slyvia D’Souza. Her brother is Keith D’Souza. She did her schooling from Auxilium Convent School, Wadala, Maharashtra. She later did graduation from St. Xaviers College, Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Krystle D’Souza made her debut into television with Balaji Telefilms’ Kahe Naa Kahein 2007. The next television serial was Kya Dill Mein Hai as Tamanna. In 2010, Krystle D’Souza appeared in Baat Hamari Pakki Hai and Aahat. She became popular for the show, Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hai for the lead role, Jeevika alongside Karan Tacker. She played the role of Sakshi in Ekk Nayi Pehchaan. She later took a break for 2 years and returned to television in 2016 as Raina Sharma in Brahmarakshas. Kamal Hassan is recognized as one of the most talented and versatile actors in the South Indian film industry, who comes only after Rajnikanth in terms of fan following and popularity. He has also worked in some Bollywood films, and achieved phenomenal success there too.

Net Worth: $ 100 million

Income Sources: Kamal Hassan is one of the highest paid actors in the South Indian film industry. He is a multi talented artist, who has also tried his hands in film production, direction, playback singing, screen writing and choreography

Born: 7th November, 1954 (65 years old)

Marital Status: Kamal Hassan has been married twice, first to Vani Ganapathy and later to Sarika, but he separated from both of them. Currently, he is living with actress Gouthami Tadimalla since 2005.

Height/Weight: 5 feet 5 inches, 75 kg

Personal Background

Kamal Hassan was born in Tamil Nadu and his father was a criminal lawyer, who wanted him to study but he had other interests, which took him towards a career in acting. He has amassed a huge wealth from his career and has also ventured into film production and direction. Despite his phenomenal success in film career, Kamal Hassan has never been successful in his personal relationships. He separated from his first wife of 10 years, Vani Ganapathy due to his relationship with Sarika, from whom he has two daughters, Shruti Hassan and Akshara Hassan, both of them making a film career. He had a live in relationship with Sarika and married her only after the birth of their second daughter in 1988. But the couple split up in 2002, reportedly due to his relations with co actress, Simran Bagga. Kamal Hassan is recognized for his humanitarian efforts in various fields, such as awareness against HIV-AIDS and working for orphaned and cancer stricken children.

Career Graph

Kamal Hassan started young in the industry, making his debut as a child artist in 1960 and has completed 50 glorious years in Indian cinema in 2010. He made his debut as a lead actor in 1975 with a movie called “Apoorva Raagangal”. Later, he delivered hits after hits, with films like “Moondram Pirai”, “Nayagan”, ‘Indian”, “Dasavathaaram”, “Hey Ram” and “Vishwaroopam”. He has not only emerged as one of the best actors in South Indian cinema, but also made a big name in the Hindi film industry too. Till date, he has been honored with 4 National Awards and 19 Filmfare Awards, in addition to the prestigious Padma Shree in 1990 and Padma Bhushan in 2014. He owns a production house called Rajkamal International, which has delivered a number of hits.

House and Cars

Kamal Hassan owned two luxurious bungalows, but had to sell the first one and mortgage the second one to cover the losses he incurred in making his films. He owned an amazing fleet of luxurious cars including Chevrolet Camaro Convertible which he added in his fleet in 2013, but had to sell many of them to repay the loans of his production house.

Kushal Tandon is an Indian actor and a model. He acted in a few television serials. He started his career in 2011. Even though he acted in very few serials, he became popular within less time. He also did music video and a web series. In this article, let us know more about him.

Personal Background

His mother is Sandhya Tandon. His sisters are Tina and Bhavana who are elder to him. He did his schooling from Scindia School, Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh and completed his graduation from Hans Raj College, New Delhi.

Career

Kushal Tandon started his career with modelling and was the first runner-up of Grasim Mr. India contest in January, 2005. He did his acting course from the United States. After that, he first made his debut into television with Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hai in the role of Virat Singh Vadera. This role brought him name and fame. He was ranked 6th in Eastern Eye UK magazine’s list of 50 sexiest Asian Men in 2012. Later, he participated in reality shows like, Nach Baliye 5, Bigg Boss 7, Khatron Ke Khiladi 5. He played as Arjun Sharma in Beyhadh. This also brought him good name. He did a music video song, “Zaroori Tha” with his ex-girlfriend, Gauhar Khan. He is currently acting in web series, Hum – I’m Because Of Us as Rahul Nanda.

Personal Life

Kushal Tandon was born on 28 March, 1985. He was in a relationship with Elena Boeva whom he met in Los Angeles during his acting course. Later, he broke up with her and was in a relationship with Gauahar Khan with whom he broke up.

More Information

Kushal Tandon won Indian Telly award and Lions Gold award for his television acting. In 2015, there was a twitter war between him and Ameesha Patel.
